hero.description: Cohortes is a space for testimony, questioning and collective analysis using AI to learn to decide together.

modules.title: A 5-step process
modules.subtitle: Transform collective listening into shared decisions

group.title: Build collectives
group.description: Organization members gather in small groups defined by job type, seniority level, gender or hierarchical level. These spaces become places for shared reflection.

witness.title: Witness
witness.description: Members share their testimonies within each group. Anonymized, these testimonies can then be read and discussed with other members. This creates a dynamic of collective expression that legitimizes the experiences of organization members and gives them back their power to act.

question.title: Question
question.description: Within each group, members can ask questions to interact with the content of testimonies. These questions constitute as many indicators (performance or social contribution, modeled on KPIs and KSIs) that highlight what matters for the organization. A way to decide what deserves attention.

analyze.title: Understand
analyze.description: Testimonies, analyzed with AI, provide answers to questions posed by members. AI reveals recurring themes and explains their evolution over time.

memory.title: Decide
memory.description: Equipped with their testimonies, collectively defined questions and AI analysis, organization members can make informed decisions. Over time, a collective memory is built.

memory.title: A living organizational memory
memory.description: Cohortes accompanies the present experience of organization members. But it's also a valuable tool to build and maintain a collective memory. Gathering testimonies and questioning them together contributes to building shared social representations. Cohortes archives and gives new momentum to your organization's collective culture.

methodology.title: A proven methodological framework
methodology.subtitle: Cohortes offers an approach that goes beyond the limitations of traditional questionnaires and individual interviews to create the conditions for living, structuring and collective testimony.

async.title: Asynchronous testimony
async.description: Everyone testifies when they want, when the experience is still fresh, without time constraints.

collective.title: Collective intelligence
collective.description: Anonymized testimonies are shared to create recognition, mutual understanding and collective awareness.

ai.title: AI-powered analysis
ai.description: AI identifies weak signals, groups similar situations and produces indicators without reducing the richness of testimonies.
